# MCBeerRecommender

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

MCBeerRecommender lets you choose your favorite MolsonCoors beers (Miller, Coors, Redds, etc.) and then recommends 5 beers that you might also like.
